insertHLTxPT

public int[] insertHLTxPT(java.util.List llts,
                          int startIndex,
                          int version_id,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> hltCodeToIdMap,
                          java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> ptCodeToIdMap)
This method loads the meddra_hlt_pt mapping table. New ids that were generated while loading data into the meddra_hlt and meddra_pt tables are used. Earlier meddra_code were used as ids and supporting multiple versions was not possible in that case.

Parameters:
llts -
startIndex -
hltCodeToIdMap -
ptCodeToIdMap -
Returns:

deleteMeddraConcepts

public void deleteMeddraConcepts(int version_id)
This method deletes SOC, HLGT, HLT, PT, LLT and the joining tables corresponding to a particular version

Parameters:
version_id - The version_id to be deleted.

createMeddraVersion

public void createMeddraVersion(java.lang.String meddra_name)
This method adds a new meddra_version to the meddra_version table. The name of the new version is provided by the administrator through UI The Id is generated from the sequence meddra_versions_id_seq

Parameters:
meddra_name - This is the name of the new meddra_version
